title: IGtol.ConvertFormat
description: Converts this Gtol to the current format.
returns: 0 if successfully converted, otherwise error code as defined by swGtolFormatConversionError_e
remarks:
Before calling this method, use
IGtol::CanConvertFormat
to determine whether conversion is possible.
If unsupported data are in this older Gtol, then this method will fail.
